ygData.msgSnippet: Dr Goodwin, I managed to fix the one problem off installing the source code for Cantera in the step using Microsoft Visual Studios.  The config.h was missing

Dr Goodwin,
I managed to fix the one problem off installing the source code for 
Cantera in the step using Microsoft Visual Studios.  The config.h 
was missing from C:\cantera-1.5.3\Cantera\src and this was what was 
causing the error.  After sucessfully installing building all the 
files using Visual Studio i then went to the cygwin window and 
typed 'make win' to build the phython interface and Matlab toolboxes.
The file from build/include/cantera were sucessfully built but when 
cygwin changed directorires to Cantera/python is got the following 
errors:

cd Cantera/python; make win
make[1]: Entering directory `/cygdrive/c/Documents and Settings/Sean 
Henderson/Desktop/New Folder/cantera-1.5.3/Cantera/python'
make[1]: *** No rule to make target `and', needed by `_winbuild'.  
Stop.
make[1]: Leaving directory `/cygdrive/c/Documents and Settings/Sean 
Henderson/Desktop/New Folder/cantera-1.5.3/Cantera/python'
make: *** [python] Error 2

It appears that I am missing a files in the Cantera/python folder.  
By the way the make 'make win' command in cygwin was done in the 
folder where the source code was extracted from the .zip file and 
not from C:Cantera-1.5.3 where the project was built using Visual 
Studio.  Did i make a mistake in installing Cantera or is there 
another type of error.  Any help would be greatly appriciated.

Thank You,
Sean
